name: @51jbs/webpack-coverage-plugin
description: Webpack plugin for collecting code coverage during development and generating incremental self-testing reports

scripts.build: tsc && tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json && mkdir -p dist/infra/report/templates && cp -r src/infra/report/templates/* dist/infra/report/templates/ && mkdir -p dist/cjs/infra/report/templates && cp -r src/infra/report/templates/* dist/cjs/infra/report/templates/

author: chuanjing.li
